top.title: Zohran Mamdani projected winner of New York City mayoral election
top.summary: It is a historic moment as Mamdani also becomes the first South Asian and Muslim to lead the city.

top.title: Dick Cheney's death a loss to the nation, says George W Bush
top.summary: Cheney became one of the most powerful vice-presidents in US history under Bush, and was a key architect in his "war on terror".

top.title: Israel identifies body returned by Hamas as Israeli-American soldier
top.summary: Israeli-American soldier Itay Chen's remains were returned to Israel via the Red Cross in Gaza on Tuesday.

top.title: France investigates Shein and Temu after sex doll scandal
top.summary: Retailers Wish and AliExpress are also being investigated in relation to the offence of enabling minors to access pornographic content.

top.title: Tesla says Musk should be paid $1tn - will shareholders agree?
top.summary: The car-maker is lobbying fiercely for the pay package, which is being voted on ahead of its AGM on Thursday.

top.title: AI 'godmother' Fei-Fei Li says she is 'proud to be different'
top.summary: AI pioneer Professor Fei-Fei Li is set to receive a top engineering prize from the King for her contributions to the field.
